title: Hunter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player to Hunt, then choose a player you think they will visit. If the player you Hunt visits the chosen player, you will shoot the Hunted player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you shoot a town member, you will lose the ability to Hunt.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may Track a player, learning who they visit. 1 use.

desc:
Post 4687
*Killing animals is easy. Tracking them down is the hard part.*
